document.title: Technical Bulletins: Payment of Social Security Taxes on Sick Leave Compensation
document.abstract: This Technical Bulletin contains information about Public Law 97-123, which provided that payments made on account of sickness or disability caused by accident, with some exceptions, were taxable wages for social security purposes effective January 1, 1982.
